entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prévost
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
